<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Singing Bowl of the Versatile Stance](/Equipment.aspx?ID=574)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 123 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,175 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** follower of  Irori 

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

In true Iroran form, the simplicity of this small, inverted copper bell belies its flawlessness. When struck with a mallet (included with the singing bowl), it emits a harmonious tone that inspires bodily perfection in those who know how to hear it.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16))    **Effect** While holding the _singing bowl of the versatile stance_ with one hand, you strike the lip of it with a mallet held in the other. Anyone within 60 feet currently in a stance can spend a reaction to use one of their [stance](/Traits.aspx?ID=152) actions in order to change to a different stance.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Singing Bowl of the Versatile Stance
